meta.title: My Crypto Heroes (MCH, マイクリ) | Crypto game from Japan!
meta.description: Block Chain Game,My Crypto Heroes (MCH) -where your time and passion will become your assets. Get great extensions and Land through collecting/training historical Heroes! Can be played without gas fee.

top.leadMessage: Your time and passion will become assets.
top.signIn: If you play {type} with your {message}, you can't use same account. Are you sure to log in?
top.signInWarning: * To play all contents of My Crypto Heroes you need a wallet app. Please check the FAQ for details.
top.stop: 【Announcement】New user registraion is stopped now to take measures against malicious BOT.

welcome.name: What's your name in the MCH World?
welcome.inviteCode: Input your Invite Code (if you have)

top.guide: Learn how to play My Crypto Heroes

title: What is
My Crypto Heroes?
intro.body:
My Crypto Heroes is an RPG battle game that is built on the Ethereum blockchain. Play with historical inspired heroes, go on quests to find rare items, and battle against other players for rewards and fame.
We are the world’s No.1 blockchain game, based on Daily Active Users, and Transactions. ※ as of August 21st 2019 from DappRadar (https://dappradar.com)

pve.title: PvE Mode
pve.body: Send your heroes into dungeons to collect EXP and find rare items, called Original Extensions (ERC-721 token). EXP can be used to level up your assets.

pvp.title: PvP Mode
pvp.body: Fight other players in competitive tournaments, tailored to different player strengths. Top players earn Original Extensions (ERC-721) and eternal fame.

jobs.title: Farmer
jobs.body: Farmers go on quests to level up heroes and find rare items. Sell your loot on the market to earn GUM, the currency of MCH.

jobs.title: Warrior
jobs.body: Warriors fight in PvP battles for rare items and fame. Prove your skill in regular tournaments, Land vs. Land battles, and custom arenas.

jobs.title: Creator
jobs.body: Are you one of the creative kind? Sell your self-made hero skins on the art market for GUM. Or get creative in your own tournament modes.

jobs.title: Trader
jobs.body: Traders use the in-game market to earn GUM. They buy the supply of farmers and equip warriors before they send their heroes into battle.

hero.title: Heroes
hero.body: Each hero with the rarity Uncommon or higher is an ERC-721 token. This means that you own the token and can sell it on 3rd party platforms like OpenSea.

items.title: Items
items.body: Each unique item, called Original Extensions, is an ERC-721 token too. You will find them through fighting in quests or competing in tournaments.

dapper.title: Dapper Extension
dapper.body: Easy to use wallet, great design, and simple onboarding. Recommended for users who don't want to deal with private keys and Gas fees.

metamask.title: MetaMask Extension
metamask.body: Most used wallet for Ethereum dapps. Recommended for users who will use ETH sent from crypto exchange.

signInModal.install: Please install a wallet to continue:
signInModal.signInWithGoogle: If you've created an account on Google, click here.

reset.warning: This action will reset this team to its initial state. Is it OK?

referral.description:
Share your invite code and get ETH!
When you refer a new player, you'll receive a 5% revenue share every time the new player spends ETH in the game. (During specific campaigns, it may be increased to “equivalent to 10%”, etc.)
referral.gift:
Invite Code Gift
Every new player who used your invite code will get the Replica Hero "Brothers Grimm".
referral.warning: * "Sign in" with Wallet is necessary. In the case of "Trial Play with Google", "Invitation Code" is not displayed.
referral.shareText: #MyCryptoHeroes, Your time and passion will become assets. ‪Join Japanese authentic “blockchain RPG” which can be played without cryptocurrency, and even wallets!!‬
referral.afterShareText: Invitation code: {inviteCode} Get special Hero with code!

approve.description: To use your heroes, you need to finish two steps: 1st, Transfer Preparation. 2nd, Transfer to MCH World.
approve.extensiondescription: To use your extensions, you need to finish two steps: 1st, Transfer Preparation. 2nd, Transfer to MCH World.

assetId.heroLock: You are currently using this hero. Remove hero from your team and duel team.
assetId.extensionLock: You are currently using this extension. Remove it from your team and duel team.

withdrawWarning.description: You can use your assets on Ethereum or Polygon Network after you transferred your assets to the respective Network.
withdrawWarning.1: It will cost {gum} GUM for transferring it to the Ethereum network, 100 GUM to the Polygon Network
withdrawWarning.3: To transfer, Extension needs to be at least Lv.2 and have a Nickname
withdrawWarning.4: To transfer, Hero has to be at least Lv.2 and art-edited
withdrawWarning.5: It takes about 20 mins to trasfer, depending on the current Network status.
withdrawWarning.6: You can't transfer an assets (Hero / Extension) that has been used in battle within 24 hours or has been traded / bought within 24 hours.
withdrawWarning.7: Transfers to an On-Chain Network will require GUM based on current Gas rates of the Network.

warning.title: Art edit rules and notes
list: You can do Art-edit as much as you want for a hero, but you need to pay 40 GUM (Game Users Money) from the second time.
You can set previous art including default one without GUM fee. However passive skill and growth tendency will be remained.
Images exactly the same as those registered in Art-edit in the past can not be used in Art-edit.
Do not use pictures that infringe copyright or images that are against public order and morality.
Attention on using Art-edit is stated in Article 11 of the following terms of service.
We guarantee that you own copyright of art that you registered with Art-edit.
We will use the registered art only for MCH game and promotional use.
Images uploaded with Art-edit are managed decentralizedly using IPFS which is a distributed file system.
For edited images, only the display in MCH is changed. On external services such as opensea, the initial image is displayed even after editing.
warning.cost: You need to pay 40 GUM (Game Users Money) from the second time. Is it OK?

land.title: Land
land.settingG5: Battle Order Of Knights In Flag Battle (King/G5 Only)
land.detail1: If you have a landsector, you can become a lord of the land. And you can dedicate to Cryptid of the land and quest its land node. Also you can withdraw landlord reward.
land.detail2: When you send your landsector for its first time, you need to set name and art edit.

join.2: Once you choose it you can not leave until the next preparatory period
join.3: You will no longer be able to turn Free Agent this season.
join.title: Join Land

detail.already:
You can change your land only once during the preparation period of every land battle season.
You can not belong to any lands until the next preparation period, even if you leave your land and become Independent.
detail.new:
When you belong to land, your hero can get stronger owing to Cryptid and you can entry land battle.
You can only change once every season.
detail.community:
Sometimes, King and Maestros run campains or supports users
Let's check community before deciding your land.

leave.1: Leave the land and become Independent
leave.2: Once you leave this land and become Independent, you can not belong to any lands until the next preparation period
leave.3: You can not join any lands till next season. Are you sure to leave?

freeAgentPool.headline: Dedicate to Free Agent GUM Pool
freeAgentPool.1: Support your Land with GUM to hire Knights.
freeAgentPool.2: The dedicated GUM can be used by the King to purchase Knights from other Lands for Land Battle.

freeAgent.hasDeclared: Declared to be a Free Agent for {gum} GUM
freeAgent.notKnight: Can't declare Free Agent - Knights only

confirm.declare: Are you sure to become a Free Agent at a price of {gum} GUM?
confirm.cancelDeclared: Are you sure to cancel the Free Agent declaration?
confirm.receive: Are you sure to hire this Free Agent to your Land for {gum} GUM?

landBattle.title: Land Battle
landBattle.detail:
Land Battle consists of 'Knight Battle(1-5)', 'Knight Battle-G5' and 'Flag Battle'.
Knights can get a part of land profit, and G5 can join flag battle(fight with G5 of other lands) as representatives.

descriptions.g5: This battle decides the 5 Knights (G5) who will represent each Land in Flag Battle. Only the Knight Class participates in this battle. G5 Knights will be decided by the Achievement Points ranking at the end of this Battle.
descriptions.knightCommander: This is the epic battle between all Knight Commanders of all lands. There are two main battles: 1st Battle is a qualification round between Knight Commanders of the same land. 2nd Battle is a tournament between all lands to determine the best Knight Commander!

pledge.title: Pledge for fair play
pledge.body: I will play fair, conforming to the terms of use and Land-battle rules.
pledge.warnings: In the Land Battle you need to organize a dedicated team.

heroRarityCost.title: Hero Rarity Cost
heroRarityCost.description: "Hero Realty Cost" has been set for the rarealities "Novice", "common", "Uncomon", "Rare", "Epic" and "Legendary" of heroes. For this land battle, the team needs to be organized so that the sum of the team's hero costs falls within the specified value.

cryptid.title: Cryptid
cryptid.detail:
Cryptid is a like guardian angel for each Land.
Your Team can get stronger with your dedication of NIE and EMA

warnings.hero: Note: Your hero's level might decrease according to the amount of CE you choose to dedicate.
warnings.extension: Note: Your extension's level might decrease according to the amount of CE you choose to dedicate.

originalExt.warnings: Note: You will lose ownership of the original extensions you dedicate. You will not be able to use them anymore.

warnings.hero: All your dedicated replica heroes will be burned.
warnings.extension: All your dedicated replica extensions will be burned.

emaEffects.title: EMA Effects
emaEffects.detail:
You can get EMA effects from your dedication of Original Extensions(EMA).
The effect of EMA is applied at the time of battle of each Knight Battle / Flag Battle / Quest / Raid Battle / Colosseum (in principle, Official Duel Cup has no effect)

barrel.title: CE Barrel
barrel.text: Enter the CE you wish to dedicate from the CE barrel.
barrel.confirm: Dedicate {ce} CE from the CE barrel to the cryptid. Are you sure?

dedicate.emaDescription: Extensions must have a Nickname set and can't be used in your team

templates.title: Team Templates
templates.description: Create team templates that you can import when you set up your PvP teams. You can create up to 3 templates, prime users can create up to 6 templates.
templates.descriptionQuest: Create templates to import to your quest teams. This is a prime only feature.
templates.getPrime: Get 6 total slots with MCH Prime

notice.text: Our latest ecosystem update removed LAB and introduced TOKU. It is a Proof of Play (PoP) system that rewards active quest farmers with Heroes, Extensions, and GUM.

modal.explainer: Dedicate your CE to your Land Cryptid.

toku.inPrep: In Preparation - TOKU Treasure will be released soon

shop.heroSaleWarning: If we detect any violation against terms of service (such as using bot, cracking and so on), we will carry out strict measures (such as suspending account, refunding GUM and burning the hero and so on)
shop.commonAttention: If the final price of the last uncommon hero is less than 2000 GUM, we start to sell the new common hero after the end of the hero sale. All common heroes will be resold until the common hero reaches to the maximum number of the issue.

about.title: Monthly MCH Prime Subscription
about.lead: MCH Prime users can enjoy the following benefits:
list: Get double CE in quests
Free Daily Bonus
Increase quest teams from 3 to 6
Increase team templates from 3 to 6
Revive teams in quests
Limited quests for Prime users
Half GUM fees for gift functions
CE auto dedication
Increase quest team templates from 0 to 6
Novice hero "Sun Shangxiang", "David" and "Fukuzawa Yukichi" present (only for those who do not have yet / excluding Free Prime)
about.dailybonus1: - Available once per day (resets at {hour} every day)
about.dailybonus2: - {gum} GUM, 1 in 500 can get between 100GUM and 3000GUM!
about.continue: Available up to 5 times every 24 hours

leftDays.warning: You can renew your subscription {updatableRemainingDays} days before the end.
leftDays.updateTiming: * It will be automatically updated {updateTiming} days before the end of the MCH Prime.

prime.notes: If you buy with ETH, your status is reflected in 5-10 mins after successing the transaction.

discription: Prime Renewal at GUM is a campaign-only installation until March 18. During that time only, automatic renewals will be in effect.
You can check the box below to turn on the automatic renewal. You can toggle the subscription ON/OFF at any time in your profile settings.
If you enable the automatic renewal: Once the remaining prime period is 72 hours or less, your prime will be automatically renewed.
Automatic renewal is only possible with GUM ({primePriceWithGum} GUM). If there is not enough GUM at the renewal day, the prime will not be renewed.

prime.purchase: You are purchasing 31 days of MCH Prime for {primePrice}. Would you like to continue?

modal.text: Cancel MCH Prime at {date} and receive {gum} GUM refund

trialPrime.consent: Join Free Prime. Is it OK?
trialPrime.tutorialTitle: How to Join MCH Prime for Free
trialPrime.tutorialBody4:
You must meet all of these requirements to join the free trial.
Please do your best!

novice.1: Novice Hero is in game hero.
novice.2: Unable to sell and transfer to an On-Chain Network.

replica.1: Replica heroes will be expired in 7 days after setting it in your team for the first time. Replica heroes do not recover stamina over time. Please be careful.
replica.2: In addition, please read details before purchase.
replica.3: Currently, Replica Hero is temporarily suspended from sale.
replica.5: GUM and purchase this replica hero?
replica.refresh: Would you consume {gum} GUM and refresh the replica hero pickup?
regendaryTrial: The trial campaign runs from July 22th to July 26th, and the campaign’s Legendary Replica Hero (Alexander/Qin Shi Huang /Minamoto Yoshitsune) has an Lv of 100. Note that the Lv will decrease to 70 by July 26th (Planned around UTC 6:00 July 26th) regardless of whether it is used or not.

The passive skill effectiveness and params of the new Legendary Hero is currently being adjusted and subject to change without notice. The actual selling of Legendary Heroes reflects the adjusted skills and params.(Updated at UTC 1:43pm July 22nd)
During the campaign period, the Replica Hero lineup cannot be refreshed arbitrarily.
During the campaign, your purchase status is refreshed at UTC 0:00 o’clock every morning.

body.finished: Land Pre-sale application acceptance period has ended.
body.lead: Pre-sale will be a "bulk sale" premised on bulk purchase of the country, mainly for business operators and large-lot investors (imagine like “buy one building” for apartment sales, for example)
list: Price: 500ETH/Land
Number of Lands to be sold: 4 countries (in 9)
Period: 2/13 Wednesday 7:00~2/18 6:00 UTC( winners will be chosen on 2/19)
We will do KYC(Know Your Client. Confirm your identification), and once you agree to purchase the land, we will make the agreement with each holder.

warning.p: * Please check the following Medium article and apply after understanding the content of Land Pre-sale.

pledge.content: I have already checked "Terms of service" and "Land Crowd-sale"

trade.artRule1: Listing is free! At purchase time, 10% fee will be deducted.
trade.artRule2: There is a lower limit for "Start Price" and "End Price". You can set 100 GUM or more for "Start Price" and 10 GUM or more for "End Price".
trade.rule1: Listing is free! At purchase time, 10% fee will be deducted.
trade.rule2: The rate of the price decrease over time is calculated automatically. The price will decrease by 20% of the difference between Start Price and Ending Price per day. This means, in 5 days, the price will drop to the set 'Ending Price'.
trade.rule3: Note: The item (heroes and/or extensions) must be unequipped in all your teams. Additionally, heroes and/or extensions can't be sent to an On-Chain Network while it's on trade
trade.rule4: You can list up to 100 assets a day. You can cancel your sale listings at any time
trade.rule5: There is a minimum limit for "Start Price" and "End Price". You need to set at least 100 GUM for "Start Price" and at least 10 GUM for "End Price".
trade.rule6: You need to wait 24h before listing if your asset (Hero / Extension) has been purchased, used in Quest, Reward, Trade, or was transferred to/from an On-Chain Network
trade.rule7: Once you listed your asset for sale, there is a 30min 'Waiting Period' before anyone can buy it. It has the status 'Just Listed' and cannot be bought during that time. This prevents price scrapers and creates a fair market.
trade.rule8: If a copied art is reported by its original creator, we will stop listing the copied art. In the case of repetitive infringement, we will carry out strict measures (such as suspending accounts, reverting art sale transactions, and so on).

details.confirmStop: Are you sure you want to cancel this trade?

trade.confirmRemoveStar: Are you sure to reset all starred heroes? You cannot revert this action.

absorb.disclaimer: Your selected extensions will be absorbed. Are you sure to continue?

closeWarning.text: You have an unfinished quest. Do you want to continue where you left off?

continue.title: Revive
continue.text: As part of your MCH Prime subscription, you can revive your party for up to {count} times per day for free.

help.title: About Revive
help.body: As part of your MCH Prime subscription, you can revive your party for up to {count} times per day for free. Your Revive count gets reset back to {count} every day at 0:00(UTC). Unused Revives will not carry over to the next day.

join.warning: * Your account will be banned and your trophies and Winners Point will be deprivationd if you violate terms of use or Official Duel Cup rules.

duel.title: Duel Cup

overheat.title: Overheated Heroes
overheat.subtitle: (-50% base stats)
overheat.explanation: We enable the new mechanic Overheated Heroes during the last 5 hours of the tournament. Criteria for a hero to overheat: Hero is played in more than 50% of battles AND is among the top 3 most winning heroes of that segment. Overheated heroes have their base stats cut in half.

arena.title: Arena
arena.supportProgram: Here's Official Community Event Support Program!
arena.description: Battle other players, test new strategies, and improve your skills.
arena.confirmJoin: Would you like to join this Arena? You can only join one Arena at a time.
arena.tooLate: Sorry, you're too late. This arena has already started or has been cancelled.
arena.noNineTeam: You have not initiated your 9on9 team yet. Please initiate your 9on9 team and join the arena afterwards.
arena.confirmCancelArena: Are you sure to officially cancel this Arena? You cannot undo this action.
arena.confirmLeaveArena: Are you sure to leave this Arena?
arena.inviteOthers: Invite others to fight in your Arena

arenaView.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop the move icon to change the order.Competing teams are displayed in order of ID and the order is unknown.
arenaView.movedToIce: Moved Team Fire's player 6 to Team Ice
arenaView.movedToFire: Moved Team Ice's player 6 to Team Fire

createArenaModal.title: Arena Title
createArenaModal.createNineError: Create your 9on9 Team before hosting 9on9 Arena
createArenaModal.setStartTimeWarning: The start time needs to be at least 3 minutes from now.

league.text1: Every player fights against every other player once.
league.text2: Each win gets 3 points, draw 1 point, and loss 0 points.
league.text3: The player with the most points at the end of the tournament wins.
league.text4: A maximum of 12 players can join the arena.

team.text1: There are two teams with an ordered list of max. 5 players each.
team.text2: Each respective first players start with the first battle.
team.text3: The winner will continue to battle the next player from the opponent team. (similar to Land Flag Battle)
team.text4: A maximum of 10 players can join the arena.
team.text5: Each player can change the order of players.

tournament.text2: Participants will be randomly assigned at the opening time.
tournament.text3: It then digests one round each time the set interval time elapses.
tournament.intervalDescription: Enter the interval for each round (minutes)

regulationInfo.title: What is Regulation
regulationInfo.regulationText: You can choose the available hero and extension.
regulationInfo.oficialRegulation: Red Dragon / Blue Dragon / Baby Dragon /  Dragon Egg:
regulationInfo.oficialRegulationText: The regulation of the Official Duel Cup is applied.
regulationInfo.hrcText1: You can choose HRC(Hero Rarity Cost)
regulationInfo.hrcText2: *It's applied only when battle type is [3on3]
regulationInfo.hrcText4: *There are nothing to do with extensions.

rule.title: Rule
rule.nsh: Only one hero of the same type can be formed in the team. Replica heroes are also treated as the same kind.
rule.nse: Only one extension of the same type can be organized within a team. If the rarities are different, or the replica extensions are not treated as homogeneous.

raid.title: Raid

colosseum.classDescription: Leagues in Colosseum are called Layers, and Colosseum's first term is the Qualifier. Based on the ranking in the Qualifier, players are allocated in Layers from top to bottom. As the result of ranking in each term, top players in each Layer are promoted and bottom players in each Layer are demoted. The ultimate goal of players is to reach the top positionin the final ranking.

tutorials.title: Tutorials

extensions.title: Extension
extensions.extensionBody: Extensions are weapons in My Crypto heroes. Up to two heroes can be equipped per hero, hero status is enhanced, and special skills can be activated.
extensions.originalBody: Original Extensions are one of two extension types found in MCH. They are Blockchain NFT digital assets which can be traded for GUM or for ETH on third party exchanges like OpenSea. Like Heroes, they can increase in level and range in rarity from common to legendary. Each NFT is limited in their capacity, dependent on their rarity.
extensions.replicaBody: Replica extensions are copies of original items and just data in Game(not Blockchain). They much cheaper however they cannot be traded nor can they be leveled up. They also expire after 7 days.
extensions.influenceBody: Extensions greatly influence battle. How can affect both your Heroes and your opponents.
extensions.influenceExample: *This item below pairs great with a hero whose strength is INT.
extensions.skillBody: Extensions, like heroes, have active skills. Certain skills pair well with certains heroes. Master these combinations to unlock your fighting potential.
extensions.attackBody: This skill deals damage to your opponent. This can be PHY damage or INT damage.
extensions.healBody: Healing and recovery effects give HP back to your heroes.
extensions.buffBody: Buff boost your heroes attributes. This can be for PHY, INT, and/or AGI.
extensions.debuffBody: Debuffs lower your opponent’s attributes. This can be for PHY, INT, and/or AGI.

ce.title: Crypto Energy(CE)
ce.body: Crypto Energy can be though of as experience points. You receieve CE from battling. The greater your opponent, the more CE your receieve. CE is used to level up both original heroes and extensions. If you’ve already reached a heroes’ or extensions’ max level, you can convert CE into TOKU.

land.title: Land
land.about:
Land is like country or guild in MCH, and you can join only one land out of nine.
You can try quest in land node, land battle and get profit by Cryptid, which is the Guardian of each lands when you become a member of Land. Your heroes will become stronger with cryptid effect, which makes you easy to try higher level nodes.
land.community: Most lands have their own community. The Kings or Maestros of the land are sometimes carrying out their campaigns or support beginners.
land.joinLand: Anyway, let's join a Land from here

tutorials.gum: GUM is the in-game currency for MCH. Heroes and extensions can be bought and sold for GUM. GUM can be purchased with ETH.

toku.body1: TOKU can be thought of as a loyalty program. As your accrue more TOKU Points you can redeem TOKU treasure. (Prime users can an addtional reward). The more TOKU you’ve acquired the greater the reward.
toku.body2: You can receive TOKU points by “dedicate” heroes and extensions to the Cryptide. You can either dedicate original heroes’ and extensions’ CE or you can dedicate your replicas. TOKU is a great way to get more out of used replicas or heroes and extentions who have already used their capped level.
toku.ticketExchangeBody: If you subscribe to Prime service, you can get tickets for rewards. Spend these tickets on unique original extensions only available through Ticket redemption.

rarity.title: Rarity & Level
rarity.replica: Data in Game(not blockchain). Are copies of original assets. They cannot be traded, sold, or leveled up. Find their ranges here.
rarity.novice: Data in Game(not blockchain). They can neither be traded nor sold. They are the lowest of all rarities but can still be quite powerful.
rarity.common: NFT in Blockchain. Can be traded and sold. Their level is capped at 60. Hero stamina is capped at 158.
rarity.uncommon: NFT in Blockchain. Can be traded and sold. Their level is capped at 70. Hero stamina is capped at 178.
rarity.rare: NFT in Blockchain. Can be traded and sold. Their level is capped at 80. Hero stamina is capped at 208.
rarity.epic: NFT in Blockchain. Can be traded and sold. Their level is capped at 90. Hero stamina is capped at 248.
rarity.legendary: NFT in Blockchain. Can be traded and sold. Their level is capped at 100. Hero stamina is capped at 288.

replica.title: Replicas
replica.body: Replica are copies of original heroes and extensions. They are not NFTs in Blockchain so they can neither be traded nor sold. They are a great cheap way to strengthen your team or try new strategies. They expire after 6 days once you’ve place them in your team.Replica heroes do not recover stamina over time.
replica.rarityBody: Replicas, like originals, have various rarities, although their leveling system is a bit different. Replicas range from levels “F” to “S”. “S” = legendary, “A” = Epic, etc.
replica.expireBody: After 6 days of use, your replica will expire. This means you can no longer use this replica. At this point, it is reccommended that you exchange this “broken” replica for NIE. Depending on the Land's revenue allocation settings, GUM may be allocated by dedicating an NIE.

eth.howToBody: Original heroes and extensions are ERC-721 tokens which can be traded for GUM or for ETH on thrird party exchanges like OpenSea. Because original extensions and heroes are actual ERC-721 tokens players have ownership of them. Find or win them for free or purchase them with GUM and then increase their value by increasing their level and strength.
eth.questBody: Quests aren’t only a good way to gather CE and level up your extensions and heroes, they also provide oppurtunities to find original extensions, known as “drops”. The higher the questing difficulty the greater the drop. However, the higher the rarity, the few of those drops there are. Make sure you’re questing daily to increase your chances!
eth.pvpBody: PvP campaigns like Duel Cups are another great way to win original extensions. At the end of each cup, the top  players receive original extensions.
eth.marketBody: Of course, you can always just buy original extensions and heroes with with GUM on MCH or with ETH through markets like OpenSea. Again, since each original is an ERC-721 token, each purchase is an investment and can increase in value over time.

community.discordBody:
The users always talk about MCH with other users in Discord.
Shall we enjoy MCH with us!

#mch_starter_en is for support the biginner. Ask me anything!
community.mediumBody:
We announce the news in Medium such as Duel cup, new release, and so on.

And After that, announce on Twitter, and Discord.

If you want to know the schedule of events, or rule of Duel, Please check our official Medium.
community.twitterBody:
The users, and we are operating Twitter!
You can watch the real-time information of Market, Event, Tournament powered by user, and so on.

firstQuest.teamEditBody: “Extension” is an equipment in My Crypto Heroes.Tap “Edit”, and move to team edit page.Equip the Extension with the FRONT hero this time.Tap“FRONT“
firstQuest.extentionBody: Your heroes haven’t  equipped any extensions yet.Tap bare Hand icon, and equip your extension!
firstQuest.skillBody: You finished equipping the extension.Please scroll down, check the new skill “Protection” instead of “Hit”.*The skill is changed depending on the  extension you equip.
firstQuest.questBody: You can see the special skill like “Protection”.Try out quests to get 6 extensions to let your heroes fully equipped!
firstQuest.lastTitle: Let’s aim for getting “Original Extension”. When  your heroes become stronger, more chance get that.
firstQuest.lastBody: If you have any questions, you can check the information at the Tutrial on Home.There are a lot of contents you can enjoy in My Crypto Heroes.Hope you’ll have a good time here!Also, we recommend you to join the community in Discord to chat with other players and devs!

trialPrime.title: Joining MCH Prime makes adventure more fun and comfortable.
trialPrime.info:
MCH Prime is a paid membership service (31 days).
By becoming an MCH Prime member, you can enjoy various benefits.
trialPrime.example: An example of MCH prime benefits：
trialPrime.example2:
Earn daily bonuses.
 -Available once a day (reset daily at 9:00 am)
trialPrime.text:
You can now use the MCH Prime Free Trial for 12 days! 
In addition, a free hero set comes with a replica hero set.
 First, let's check the contents of MCH prime.

welcome.title: マイクリにようこそ!!
welcome.1: この世界で得たヒーロー、アイテム（エクステンション）はあなたの資産になります。
welcome.2: まずはクエストをやってみましょう
welcome.3: クエストで経験値(クリプトエナジー)を獲得できます。また、エネミーがアイテム(エクステンション)をドロップすることがあります。

quest.title: Quest
quest.1: Lets try quest first!, Choose one of nodes
quest.2:
Choose Lv of node, and your team. Each hero has Hero stamina, that is shown on the right side of red star.
And the figure next to the blue start shows the consumption of Hero Stamina for the node.
Hero Stamina will be regenerated as time passing.
quest.3:
The cube (inside of red rectangle) shows the amount of Crypto Energy(CE) you acquired through the node.
 Level of heroes and original extensions will go up as you get certain amount of CE.
There is a either Original or Replica extension inside of the chest box(inside of blue rectangle)
There are bronze, silver and gold chests.
Note that you won’t receive CE and chests if you can’t win all three battles.

team.title: Team
team.1: You can organize your team in this tab. When you press team 1,
team.2: スキル「休む」はマイクリ独自の機能、'アートエディット'によって変化します。
team.3: アートエディットはインベントリのヒーロー詳細画面から実行できます。
team.4: アートエディット詳細
team.5: 最強のチームをつくり、クリプトワールドを制覇しよう！

ranking.title: To enjoy MCH more!
ranking.1: You might not get the reward of Ranking Match #2
ranking.2: You must connect your ETH wallet to get the reward
ranking.3: You must finish 'connect to Wallet' to receive the reward of Ranking Match #2

merit.1: If you connet to Wallet successfully, you can

wallet.2: 'connet to Wallet' is a function that allows your current Google account to use Ethereum
wallet.3: You must use your laptop and Google Chrome to 'connect to Wallet'
wallet.4: Install wallet extension to your laptop and join Ranking Match #2!

land.1: This page describes detail of each land.
land.2: You can see King and Maestros and the policy of usage of land revenue share.
land.3: Sometimes, each land has its own campaign in its community or twitter.
land.4: You can join one of the lands and become citizen of it.
land.5: You have to be careful to choose one of them, because you can change your land status only once for one season of land battle.
land.6: You can transfer to another land or become Independent in the preparation period of next season of land battle.
land.7:
You can change your land status('Join', 'Transfer', or 'Become Independent) only once in preparation period.
Check detail of lands and community, choose one carefully.

connect.title: Connet to Wallet
connect.requirement: Laptop and specific browser Google Chrome, Firefox, Opera

sentence.1: Use Browser Extension for Blockchain Game
sentence.4: Click the icon at the upper right of the browser
sentence.5: Set the wallet  ※You must backup important keys. And also never share them.
sentence.7: Log in with your current Googl account.
sentence.8: Click the Account Setting in submenu
sentence.10: お使いのスマートフォンでも、Wallet機能付きブラウザアプリをダウンロードしていただきimport作業をすることで、デイリーボーナスやGUM購入が可能性になります。
sentence.11: 詳細はこちら(外部サイト)

browser.1: You may use browser without METAMASK or METAMASK is signed out.
browser.2: Please use browser with METAMASK(such as Chrome), or sign in to METAMASK.

mobile.2: You can buy GUM and get Daily Bonus if you use Ethereum.

errors.4011:
We have an important announcement for you

The My Crypto heroes team has an important announcement for you.
Please contact us at the following email address with your User ID.
mch-support@mycryptoheroes.net

continuousLogin.4: Please select the replica hero you want from the following.
continuousLogin.6: One of Rep C (Uncommon Equivalent) Replica Hero from the list will be sent as a welcome campaign!
continuousLogin.7: One of Replica Hero present of Rep A (equivalent to Epic) by logging in for 7 days in a row!
continuousLogin.9: You will get Replica Hero RepA in {day} Days!
continuousLogin.13: Keep logging in to get another welcome present. The next one will be a much stronger Replica Hero to help you fight more difficult quests.

userName.description: Choose a username for your MCH account.

addHero.title: Add your heroes
addHero.subTitle: Click any position slot below to add your new heroes.
addHero.subBody:
Select order.
You can change the order later.

afterHeroAdded.title: Heroes added!
afterHeroAdded.subTitle: These heroes are not NFTs but they will help you learn how to play and acquire new items.

afterTeamSet.title: All set!
afterTeamSet.subTitle: Click to learn about your hero’s stats. When you’re ready click Let’s play to begin.

initFirstTeam.staminaDescription: Stamina is like energy for your heroes. When you quest, your heroes consume stamina. Stamina recovers by 1 point every 5 minutes.

teamDetail.hp: HP: The amount of life your hero has before they die.
teamDetail.phy: PHY: The amount of physical damge your hero gives when attacking.
teamDetail.int: INT: The amount of Intelligence damge your hero gives when attacking.
teamDetail.agi: AGI: How often your hero can attack with an Active Skill.

replicaPresent.headline: Your Welcome Present!
replicaPresent.explainer1: We’d like to give you a welcome present. Please select which Replica Hero you’d like. In 6 days, you will get another, even stronger present.
replicaPresent.explainer2: Congratulations on your day 6! Please select one of the below heroes to make your team even stronger and beat higher level nodes.
replicaPresent.explainer3: These heroes aren’t original, NFT heroes but for a limited time they can be of great help to your MCH journey.

replicaPresent.headline: We're giving away a replica hero set!
replicaPresent.explainer1: Thank you for using the MCH Prime free trial
replicaPresent.explainer2:
You can win one of three teams: a PHY team that goes well with PHY extensions, an INT team that goes well with INT extensions, and an endurance team that goes well with recovery-type extensions.
Choose your favorite team and press the OK button.
replicaPresent.explainer3: If you win, be sure to enter the Colosseum and try to get a top finish!
